Package org.promasi.core

Implementation of the core layer

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IComputationalSequence Basic interface representing a Computational sequence.
IEquation Represents an equation.
ISdListener Listener that gets notified when a step of the system has finished.
ISdObject Basic interface that represents an object in a system dynamic model(stock,flow etc).
IStatePersister Persists the state of the SdModel for a specific step.
 

Class Summary
Event Represents an event of the core.
SdModel The SdModel consists of many ISdObjects that describe the model.
SdSystem The SdSystem contains one SdModel.
 

Enum Summary
EquationType The equation type.
SdObjectType The type of an ISdObject.
 

Package org.promasi.core Description

Implementation of the core layer
